name: Centurian
description:
CENTURIAN

This game is designed as a simple fun and entertaining game. It consists of blocks and deadly green slime.  This block was generated into a world in which he doesn't understand in the end realization kicks in making him realize that he is a little block in a massive video game world.

How to play: 

WASD or Arrow keys to move and jump

R to rewind time and shrink

Questions or enquiry: high_rise_help@outlook.com
